#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int cases;
	cin>>cases;
	int Ncoins;
	int weight;
	int dp[10010];
	pair<int,int> coins[510];
	for(int i=0;i<cases;i++){
		cin>>Ncoins>>weight;
		weight = weight-Ncoins;
		cin>>Ncoins;
		int a,b;
		//First - value
		//Second - weight
		int tmp = 1<<30;
		for(int j=0;j<Ncoins;j++){
			cin>>a>>b;
			coins[j].first=a;
			coins[j].second=b;
				tmp = min(tmp, b);
		}
		for(int j=0;j<tmp;j++){
			dp[j]=0;
		}
		for(int j=tmp;j<=weight;j++){
			tmp = 1<<30;
			for(int k=0;k<Ncoins;k++){
				int tmp1=0;
				if(j>=coins[k].second){
					if(dp[j-coins[k].second]>0 || j==coins[k].second){
						tmp1 =  coins[k].first+dp[j-coins[k].second];
					}
					if(tmp1 < tmp && tmp1!=0){
						tmp = tmp1;
					}
				}
			}
			if(tmp == 1<<30){
				dp[j]=0;
			}else{
				dp[j]=tmp;
			}
		}
		if(!dp[weight]){
			cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		}else{
			cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<dp[weight]<<"."<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
//1 1
//2 1
//11 1
